name: Goblin's Bizarre Adventure
description:
Most people think that goblins are treacherous and cunning creatures, but in fact it is very one-sided. Among the many species, there will always be some so-called alternatives. Our protagonist today is such a cute goblin, he yearns for a free life, but the good times don't last long, he doesn't know why someone always wants to get it, and since then he has started a life of escape. Escape the pursuit of others and find the free life you yearn for.

Use your mouse to click on the ground to help the goblin find the way forward, and help him arrange the shortest path so that he can escape the pursuit smoothly.

But sometimes you may find that the journey seems a little far away or the time seems to be insufficient, then use the props you find to help the goblin stop the pursuers from delaying their pace, and give the goblin time to escape.

However, be careful of the traps on the map, which will become the main obstacle for goblins to escape, but if they can be used reasonably, these traps may also find a way to escape in the shortest time.
